prompt: Evaluate the challenges and benefits of global and international education, and analyze strategies to develop global competence and intercultural understanding among students.

criteria.name: Understanding of Global Education Concepts
criteria.description: Demonstrates clear understanding of international education principles and global competence development.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Clearly articulates the aims, definitions, and importance of global education and intercultural competence.
performance_descriptors.good: Describes fundamental concepts with adequate depth.

criteria.name: Insightful Analysis of Challenges and Opportunities
criteria.description: Evaluates key benefits and obstacles in implementing global education initiatives.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Provides nuanced, evidence-based discussion of institutional and cultural challenges and benefits.
performance_descriptors.good: Discusses challenges and benefits with some detail.
performance_descriptors.average: Mentions issues in a general way.

criteria.name: Use of Research and Case Examples
criteria.description: Incorporates research studies and practical examples supporting global education efforts.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Effectively integrates multiple case studies and research findings.

criteria.name: Strategies for Developing Global Competence
criteria.description: Proposes detailed, actionable methods for fostering intercultural understanding and global skills.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Outlines innovative, evidence-based strategies adaptable to diverse educational contexts.

criteria.name: Academic Writing and Coherence
criteria.description: Assesses clarity, organization, and formal academic tone.

performance_descriptors.excellent: Exceptionally clear, logical, and scholarly writing.

key_points: Explain global education and global competence concepts with emphasis on intercultural skills.
Analyze institutional opportunities such as cultural exchange and curricular globalization, and challenges such as language barriers and resource disparity.
Integrate research and exemplary case studies promoting internationalization.
Detail strategic approaches including collaborative projects, language learning, and technology-facilitated exchanges.
Communicate in formal, well-structured academic prose.
llm_questions: What defines global competence in education?
How do schools face challenges when internationalizing curricula?
What benefits does global education offer students and institutions?
What research supports effective global education strategies?
How can intercultural understanding be cultivated?
What role do language acquisition and exchanges play?
How does technology bridge gaps in global learning?
